BoolProperty.Name: MSVCErrorReport
BoolProperty.Description: Report errors that Visual Studio can parse for file and line information.

StringProperty.Name: GccToolChain
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to Gcc Tool Chain.

StringProperty.Name: Sysroot
StringProperty.Description: Folder path to the root directory for headers and libraries.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path; separate with semi-colons if more than one. (-I[path]).

EnumProperty.Name: DebugInformation
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies how much debugging information is generated by the compiler.

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Produces no debugging information, so compilation maybe faster.

EnumValue.Name: Minimal
EnumValue.Description: Produces minimal information, enough for making backtraces in parts of the program that you don't plan to debug.

EnumValue.Name: Extra
EnumValue.Description: Includes extra information, such as all the macro definitions present in the program.

EnumProperty.Name: DebugInformationFormat
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the type of debugging information generated by the compiler.

EnumValue.Name: GDB
EnumValue.Description: Produce debugging information for use by GDB. This means to use the most expressive format available

StringProperty.Name: ObjectFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a name to override the default object file name; can be file or directory name. (/Fo[name]).

EnumProperty.Name: WarningLevel
EnumProperty.Description: Select how strict you want the compiler to be about code errors. Other flags should be added directly to Additional Options. (/w, /Weverything).

EnumValue.Name: EnableAllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Enables all warnings, including those disabled by default.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWarningAsError
BoolProperty.Description: Treats all compiler warnings as errors. For a new project, it may be best to use /WX in all compilations; resolving all warnings will ensure the fewest possible hard-to-find code defects.

BoolProperty.Name: Verbose
BoolProperty.Description: When Verbose mode is enabled, this tool would print out more information that for diagnosing the build.

BoolProperty.Name: Pedantic
BoolProperty.Description: Issue all the warnings demanded by strict ISO C and ISO C++; reject all programs that use forbidden extensions.

EnumProperty.Name: WarnReorder
EnumProperty.Description: Warn when a member initializer list initializes a field out of declarative order

EnumProperty.Name: WarnSwitch
EnumProperty.Description: Warn whenever a switch statement has an index of enumerated type and lacks a case for one or more of the named codes of that enumeration

EnumProperty.Name: WarnSwitchDefault
EnumProperty.Description: Warn whenever a switch statement does not have a default case.

EnumProperty.Name: Optimization
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the optimization level for the application.

BoolProperty.Name: OmitFramePointers
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses creation of frame pointers on the call stack.

EnumProperty.Name: ExceptionHandling
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the model of exception handling to be used by the compiler.

EnumValue.Name: UnwindTables
EnumValue.Description: Generates any needed static data, but does not affect the code generated.

BoolProperty.Name: FunctionLevelLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Allows the compiler to package individual functions in the form of packaged functions (COMDATs). Required for edit and continue to work. (ffunction-sections).

BoolProperty.Name: DataLevelLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Enables linker optimizations to remove unused data by emitting each data item in a separate section.

EnumProperty.Name: FloatABI
EnumProperty.Description: Selection option to choose the floating point ABI.

EnumValue.Name: soft
EnumValue.Description: 'Soft' causes compiler to generate output containing library calls for floating-point operations.

EnumValue.Name: softfp
EnumValue.Description: 'SoftFP' allows the generation of code using hardware floating-point instructions, but still uses the soft-float calling conventions.

EnumValue.Name: hard
EnumValue.Description: 'Hard' alows generation of floating-point instructions and uses FPU-specific calling conventions.

EnumProperty.Name: BufferSecurityCheck
EnumProperty.Description: The Security Check helps detect stack-buffer over-runs, a common attempted attack upon a program's security. (fstack-protector).

BoolProperty.Name: PositionIndependentCode
BoolProperty.Description: Generate Position Independent Code (PIC) for use in a shared library.

EnumValue.Name: gnu99
EnumValue.Description: ISO/IEC C99 Language Standard with non-standard GNU extensions

EnumValue.Name: gnu11
EnumValue.Description: ISO/IEC C11 Language Standard with non-standard GNU extensions

EnumValue.Name: gnu++98
EnumValue.Description: ISO/IEC C++03 Language Standard with non-standard GNU extensions

EnumValue.Name: gnu++11
EnumValue.Description: ISO/IEC C++11 Language Standard with non-standard GNU extensions

EnumValue.Name: gnu++1y
EnumValue.Description: ISO/IEC C++14 Language Standard with non-standard GNU extensions

BoolProperty.Name: RuntimeTypeInfo
BoolProperty.Description: Adds code for checking C++ object types at run time (runtime type information). (frtti, fno-rtti)

BoolProperty.Name: StrictAliasing
BoolProperty.Description: Enforce strict aliasing rules: An object may only be accessed through its static type, dynamic type, or array of unsigned char

BoolProperty.Name: UseShortEnums
BoolProperty.Description: Enum type uses only as many bytes required by input set of possible values.

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Defines a preprocessing symbols for your source file. (-D)

StringListProperty.Name: UndefinePreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor undefines. (-U [macro])

BoolProperty.Name: UndefineAllPreprocessorDefinitions
BoolProperty.Description: Undefine all previously defined preprocessor values. (-undef)

BoolProperty.Name: ShowIncludes
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a list of include files with compiler output. (-H)

EnumProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeader
EnumProperty.Description: Create/Use Precompiled Header:Enables creation or use of a precompiled header during the build.

StringProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies header file name to use for precompiled header file. This file will be also added to 'Forced Include Files' during build

StringProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderOutputFileDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the directory for the generated precompiled header. This directory will be also added to 'Additional Include Directories' during build

EnumProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderCompileAs
EnumProperty.Description: Select compile language option for precompiled header file (-x c-header, -x c++-header).

EnumProperty.Name: CompileAs
EnumProperty.Description: Select compile language option for .c and .cpp files. 'Default' will detect based on .c or .cpp extention. (-x c, -x c++)

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: one or more forced include files. (-include [name])
